# 灵魂之药

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/linghun-zhiyao
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/linghun-zhiyao
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install linghun-zhiyao
linghun-zhiyao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g linghun-zhiyao
linghun-zhiyao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
